summary: Completes each blacksmith's set of smithing utensils across Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Completes each blacksmith's set of smithing utensils across Skyrim.

Mod currently implemented in
- Solitude (Smelter added)
- Dawnstar (Grindstone and Workbench added)
- Whiterun, Skyforge (Tanning rack and Workbench added)
- Riverwood (Smelter added)
- Falkreath (Smelter added)
- Riften (Smelter added)

It may conflict with other mods you have which change the scenery around blacksmiths, as this mod adds physical bulky objects to towns (smelters, workbenches etc.) so please use the screenshots here to check for likely collisions before downloading :)

There's also a Dragonborn version which can be found in the files section which additionally adds a tanning rack to Raven Rock (you only need to install one file or the other)
author: WolFishy
